answers.answer: Recognition from the medical community would be great. Unlike sida or diabetes or any other desease, patm is not known from the medical community.Hope this will help.

question: Apart from needing to know the cause.. what do we really  need?Vibe awareness training?Assertiveness training?A community? A leader for that community?Another forum where we post our experiences and what helps? Photos , quotes etc?community support to help us go out and live a normal life?Cognitive behavior therapy adapted to life with patm  as well as anxiety?What do we need?
title: What do we really need?
